name: 999 Platforms Castle
description:
Simple jumping game. The beginning levels are very easy so new players can easily start playing and not get frustrated that they losing quickly.

Movement A/D and Space to move Left/Right and Jump.

After a few years of thinking, I finally decided to make a game. I am not like everyone and this is not my "dream game". It is just a game. I always want to make games. So I come up with a prototype which is playable but for now, is very boring. The reason for that is I hope that people who will play it leave a comment and tell me how they feel about the movement if it is ok or if something needs to be changed. This prototype is very simple, so I want to ensure that it is good enough for most players. 

I will add more content and other stuff in the coming weeks, so it can be tested. 

Currently, there is only one mode available "Endless jump" but the truth is it is not endless right now, you can reach a max 999 level. I DARE YOU to do it.

All graphics are downloaded from itch.io pages currently cause of my lack of drawing skills. But in the future I plan to add my own images.
